QUIZ CORRECTNESS IS \n %1$d OUT OF 10 true false That\'s correct That\'s incorrect //DS Questions Network operating system runs on ___________ Logical extension of computation migration is ___________
Both T0, T1 are measured with ________ in Cristians algorithm There is no problem, if client crashes in _________ If one site fails in distributed system then ___________ What is not true about a distributed system? What are the characteristics of a distributed file system? What is not a major reason for building distributed systems? What are the characteristics of Naming and Name resolution? Which of the following is an application layer service? //DSR Questions Which of the following model is usually a gold standard for data analysis? Which function can be used to produce the graph shown above? R is an__________programming language? Who developed R? R is an interpreted language so it can access through ______ How many types of data types are present in R? Which function is used to create the vector with more than one element? In R every operation has a ______call? Which of the following is performed by Data Scientist? Which of the following is characteristic of Processed Data? //IS Questions _______ is the practice and precautions taken to protect valuable information from unauthorised access, recording, disclosure or destruction. Compromising confidential information comes under _________ Possible threat to any information cannot be ________________ Lack of access control policy is a _____________ ............... is a main, reliable method of keeping your data secure â€“ this scrambles data so anyone intercepting it cannot interpret it unauthorized access to control over computer network security systems Which one of the following describes why it is important to update antivirus software regularly? Which one of the following is NOT a security threat? What are the four possible options when responding to risk? .Voice ID, fingerprint scan and iris recognition are each examples of: next previous Distributed Systems Data Science Using R Information Security "server" "every system in a network" "both server and every system in a network" "none of the above" "process migration" "system migration" "thread migration" "data migration" "different CLK" "same CLK" "ambiguous" "none of these" "stateless servers" "stateful servers" "both 1 and 2" "none of these" "the remaining sites can continue operating" "all the sites will stop working" "directly connected sites will stop working" "none of the above" "it is a collection of processor" "all the processors are synchronized" "they do not share memory" "none of the above" "it's users,servers and storage devices are dispersed" "service activity is not carried out across the network" "they have single centralized data repository" "there are multiple dependent storage devices" "resource sharing" "computation speedup" "reliability" "simplicity" "name systems in the network" "address messages with the process-id" "virtual circuit" "message switching" "mail service" "file transfer" "remote access" "all of the above" //DSR ans "Inferential" "Descriptive" "Causal" "All of the mentioned" "xyplot()" "stripplot()" "barchart()" "bwplot()" "Closed source" "GPL" "Open source" "Definite source" "Dennis Ritchie" "John Chambers" "Bjarne Stroustrup" "None of the above" "Disk operating system" "User interface operating system" "Operating system" "Command line interpreter" "4" "5" "6" "7"
